thesis_1.en: Master's thesis: "Comparison of controlling in companies that use an ERP system"

name.en: Faculty of Organization and Informatics Varaždin

thesis_1.hr: Tema završnog rada: "Utjecaj piratskog sadržaja na industriju videoigara i filmsku industriju"
thesis_1.en: Bachelor's thesis: "The impact of piracy on the Video Game Industry and the Film Industry"

description_1.hr: Full stack software developer; ista pozicija kao u Ekobitu otkad je službeno postao dio Spana.
description_1.en: Full stack software developer; same position as in Ekobit since it officially became part of Span.

description_2.hr: Alati i tehnologije: .NET Framework, Angular, C#, CSS, Docker, Git, HTML, JavaScript, MS Azure, MS SQL, MS SSMS, MS Visual Studio, MS VS Code, pgAdmin, PostgreSQL, SCSS, SourceTree, Swagger, TypeScript.

description_2.hr: Alati i tehnologije: .NET Framework, Angular, C#, CSS, Docker, Git, HTML, JavaScript, MS Azure, MS SQL, MS SSMS, MS Visual Studio, MS VS Code, pgAdmin, PostgreSQL, SCSS, SourceTree, Swagger, TypeScript.
description_2.en: Tools and technologies: .NET Framework, Angular, C#, CSS, Docker, Git, HTML, JavaScript, MS Azure, MS SQL, MS SSMS, MS Visual Studio, MS VS Code, pgAdmin, PostgreSQL, SCSS, SourceTree, Swagger, TypeScript.

title.hr: Održavanje korisničkih računa / Iskon Internet d.d.
title.en: User account maintenance / Iskon Internet d.d.

description_1.hr: Administracija, korisnička podrška i rad na održavanju korisničkih računa.
description_1.en: Providing customer support and working on general maintenance of user accounts.

description_1.hr: Izrada aplikacije koja pruža način praćenja uspjeha i razvoja u svakom aspektu korisnikova života; od najsitnijih dnevnih ciljeva, do praćenja trenutne vrijednosti imovine uz AI pomoć za napredovanje.
description_1.en: Creating an application that provides a way to track success and self-development in every aspect of users life; from smallest daily goals, to tracking current net worth with AI assisted tips for improvement.

description_2.hr: Aplikacija je razvijena iz osobne potrebe s glavnim ciljem prikaza napretka koji se postiže svaki dan te davanja motivacije za nastavak rada. Aplikacija je trenutno u srednjoj fazi razvoja, uz planiranu produkciju tokom Q4 2024.
description_2.en: The application has been developed with personal use in mind with the main focus being making daily advancements more visible and providing motivating to continue working on self-development. Application is currently in mid-develpoment phase with planned go-live during Q4 2024.

description_3.hr: Alati i tehnologije: .NET Core, Azure DevOps, C#, CSS, Git, GPT, HTML, JavaScript, MS SQL, MS SSMS, MS Visual Studio, MS VS Code, React Native, React.JS, SCSS, SourceTree, Swagger, SQLite, TypeScript.
description_3.en: Tools and technologies: .NET Core, Azure DevOps, C#, CSS, Git, GPT, HTML, JavaScript, MS SQL, MS SSMS, MS Visual Studio, MS VS Code, React Native, React.JS, SCSS, SourceTree, Swagger, SQLite, TypeScript.

description_1.hr: Izrada .NET Framework aplikacije koja podatke o portfelju kriptovaluta drži lokalno na disku gdje nisu dostupni nikome osim vlasniku, a trenutne cijene kriptovaluta u portfelju dohvaća s CoinMarketCap-a.
description_1.en: Developing a .NET Framework application which keeps cryptocurrency portfolio data stored locally where only the owner has access to it. Current portfolio cryptocurrency prices are downloaded from CoinMarketCap.

description_2.hr: Aplikacija je razvijena iz osobne potrebe s glavnim ciljem lakšeg praćenja vrijednosti kriptovaluta koje me interesiraju. Razvoj aplikacije još uvijek je u tijeku te ju se prema potrebi nadograđuje.
description_2.en: The application has been developed for personal use with the main focus being simpler tracking of owned cryptocurrencies value. Application development is still in progress and the app is being upgraded when necessary.

description_3.hr: Alati i tehnologije: .NET Framework, ASP.NET, C#, Git, GitHub, MS Visual Studio, SourceTree, SQLite, Windows Forms.
description_3.en: Tools and technologies: .NET Framework, ASP.NET, C#, Git, GitHub, MS Visual Studio, SourceTree, SQLite, Windows Forms.

description_1.hr: Rad na CRM aplikaciji za udrugu Obitelji 3plus. Radilo se na unapređenju postojeće Laravel web aplikacije, a moj glavni fokus bio je na doradi naprednog pretraživanja i optimizaciji rada s bazom podataka.
description_1.en: Working on CRM application development for Obitelji 3plus association. Work was done on improving an existing Laravel web application and my main focus was on improving advanced user search function and database optimization.

description_2.hr: Aplikacija je bila projektni zadatak za kolegij Analiza i razvoj programa na diplomskom studiju Fakulteta organizacije i informatike Varaždin.
description_2.en: Application was a project task for Software Analysis and Design class at Faculty of Organization and Informatics Varaždin.

description_3.hr: Alati i tehnologije: CSS, Git, GitHub, HTML, Laravel, MS SQL, MS SSMS, MS VS Code, PHP, SourceTree, Xampp.
description_3.en: Tools and technologies: CSS, Git, GitHub, HTML, Laravel, MS SQL, MS SSMS, MS VS Code, PHP, SourceTree, Xampp.

description_1.hr: Osmišljanje, razvoj, dokumentiranje i implementacija .NET Framework aplikacije za praćenje količine namirnica u domaćinstvu uz mogućnost predviđanja trajanja postojećih zaliha.
description_1.en: Designing, developing, documenting and implementing a .NET Framework application used for tracking amounts of items in user's household with the capability to predict future consumption.

description_2.hr: Aplikacija je bila projektni zadatak za kolegij Programsko inženjerstvo na preddiplomskom studiju Fakulteta organizacije i informatike Varaždin.
description_2.en: Application was a project task for Software Engineering class at Faculty of Organization and Informatics Varaždin.

description_3.hr: Alati i tehnologije: .NET Framework, C#, Git, GitHub, MS SQL, MS SSMS, MS Visual Studio, SourceTree, Windows Forms.
description_3.en: Tools and technologies: .NET Framework, C#, Git, GitHub, MS SQL, MS SSMS, MS Visual Studio, SourceTree, Windows Forms.
